parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false" no-lock="false">
<entity name="contact">
<attribute name="firstname"/>
<attribute name="fullname"/>
<attribute name="emailaddress1"/>
<attribute name="lastname"/>
<order attribute="cid_contacttype" descending="false"/>
<order attribute="fullname" descending="false"/>
<attribute name="contactid"/>
<filter type="and">
<condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0"/>
<condition attribute="emailaddress1" operator="not-null"/>
<condition attribute="parentcustomerid" operator="eq" value="@{triggerBody()?['AccountId']}" />
<condition attribute="cid_contacttype" operator="eq" value="100000001"/>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

Regards,


TDG Online - CID Support Team

parameters.request/subject: CID Data Platform: Secondary Admin @{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/firstname']} @{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/lastname']} has logged into CID Platform for the first time
parameters.request/text:
Hello @{outputs('Primary_Full_name')} ,

@{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/firstname']} @{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/lastname']}, at @{variables('ContactInfo')}, has logged into CID Platform for the first time as a Secondary Admin for the @{outputs('Get_Parent_account_name')?['body/name']} Company.

If this individual should not be accessing CID for this company, then from Contacts, you have the option to:
Deactivate their Contact record, which will prevent further logins.

<attribute name="statuscode"/>
<attribute name="adx_invitationid"/>

<condition attribute="statuscode" operator="in">
<value>756150000</value>
<value>1</value>
</condition>
<condition attribute="adx_invitecontact" operator="eq" value="@{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/contactid']}"/>
<filter type="or">
<filter type="or">
<condition attribute="adx_expirydate" operator="next-x-years" value="99"/>
<condition attribute="adx_expirydate" operator="today"/>
</filter>
<condition attribute="adx_expirydate" operator="null"/>
</filter>
</filter>
</entity>
</fetch>

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: @{variables('TestSubjectText')} TDG Online - CID: Login access into the CID Platform for the @{outputs('Get_Secondary')?['body/cid_legalname']} organization has been removed

Regards,


TDG Online - CID Support Team

parameters.emailMessage/Subject: @{variables('TestSubjectText')}TDG Online - CID: Request to deactivate a Site.
parameters.emailMessage/Body:
@{variables('TestingText')}@{outputs('StandardSalutation')}

Another organization is blocked within the TDG Online CID platform from adding a site as your organization has Site ID @{triggerBody()?['SiteId']} at that same location.

If that Site is part of a Sale or Transfer, or it should not be an active Site for your organization, or it should no longer have a status indicating that your organization still owns it, then please use the 'Deactivate Site' side-menu option to deactivate it. The other organization will be then be notified and then they will be able to proceed.

Regards,


TDG Online - CID Support Team

@{outputs('English-EmailFooter')}
